wikipedia_page.main: Luke Ford (born 8 March 1988) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays Centre (rugby union)for  Neath RFC and was once part of the Cardiff Blues squad.He is the son of Wales international rugby player, Steve Ford.

response: Luke Ford (born 1981) is an Australian actor.
Luke Ford is also the name of:
*Luke Ford (rugby union) (born 1988), Welsh rugby union player
